name: VIOLA DEMO (DFlimbingo)
description:
You are an Interrobot, a robotic companion to the police in the dangerous, futuristic city of Chauso. Your job is to interrogate suspects, cut through the lies, and find the truth.

Content warning: This game has mentions of violent crime and systematic corruption. Please don't play it if that is an issue!

Web Build note: Due to the nature of Ren'Py web builds, some features in the demo have been simplified.

Please send feedback in the comments below. It will be a very great help! Thank you so much! 

Follow this page to get updated on future content!
